body: But I am mistaken in speaking of a Christian republic; the terms are mutually exclusive. Christianity preaches only servitude and dependence. Its spirit is so favourable to tyranny that it always profits by such a _régime_. True Christians are made to be slaves, and they know it and do not much mind: this short life counts for too little in their eyes.
